1101010010111010 1111001000001001 1 -> sum: 1100011011000100, cout: 1

0101011110110011 0100110111110011 1 -> sum: 1010010110100111, cout: 0
1111100001010000 0010110001111011 1 -> sum: 0010010011001100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
